name: Bounciii Ball
description:
Bounciii Ball is a short, simple but difficult Physics Pinball Platformer where you kick your ball with the flippers to the Goal forward.

navigate your ball through the 11 levels and pick up the Hexagon at the end.

There are 2 Modes:

  1. Normal Mode: The default. If you get a Checkpoint you stay on that checkpoint until you reset it or get to the next one.
  2. Speedrun Mode: a Bonus Mode if you think the normal mode is too easy. You are being timed, No Checkpoint last forever. If you restart or fall in lava, you go back to the start. You can unlock this mode by beating the normal mode once.
